description:
Tomo visits each of her best friends` houses. She meets Carol`s mom, gets some help studying for midterms at Misuzu`s, and... stays overnight at Junichiro`s house?!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Olston-ke no Onna-tachi / Yuzurenai Omoi / Dokidoki! Game Gasshuku
The Girls of the Olston Family / A Feeling I Won`t Give Up / Heart-Pounding! A Gaming Overnighter
オールストン家の女たち / 譲れない想い / ドキドキ! ゲーム合宿
